snippet: Whether it’s ice skating, rafting or a giant plastic castle, the children of attendees of the Allen & Company gathering, for media and technology moguls, have a blast.
abstract: Whether it’s ice skating, rafting or a giant plastic castle, the children of attendees of the Allen & Company gathering, for media and technology moguls, have a blast.

byline.original: By AMY CHOZICK and EVELYN M. RUSLI

headline.main: At High-Level Gathering of Moguls, Kids Get the V.I.P. Treatment
